channel.title: [PI] Help with client (black screens on login)
channel.description:
So I am using iHybrid source (pi) and it black screens for people on log in but for me it works perfectly. I tried re upping cache and changing name, I tried diff cache, but nothing is working.. and it only black screens for other people, not me... Can someone please find an adequate solution?
what I mean is it black screens the screen and map but not the gameframe or chatbox. It sends announcement messages etc.
Help please?

item.title: [PI] Help with client (black screens on login)
item.dc:creator: @BigAbdul BigAbdul
item.description:
@BigAbdul wrote:

[quote=“Meeper98, post:2, topic:398923”]Are you sure there putting the cache in the right place is the real question… and you can’t offer items on mopar for help, we’re happy to do it for free, make sure it’s not set to local host so go through, egui, client.java, ect. and search for the following:

localhost 127.0.0.1 0.0.0.0

compile then give to your friends, if that doesnt work it could just be your friends computer. Cheers mate good luck.[/quote]You’re an idiot, I have it as web client on my web host and they can connect, just blackscreen on login. It’s on my dedicated server you inbred fuck.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Help with client (black screens on login)

item.title: [PI] Help with client (black screens on login)
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

Are you sure there putting the cache in the right place is the real question… and you can’t offer items on mopar for help, we’re happy to do it for free, make sure it’s not set to local host so go through, egui, client.java, ect. and search for the following:

localhost 127.0.0.1 0.0.0.0

compile then give to your friends, if that doesnt work it could just be your friends computer. Cheers mate good luck.

Read full topic
